Name: Icons
Desc: A plugin to add additional icons to the VulpiniQ library.
Long Desc: This plugin adds a set of predefined icons to the VulpiniQ library, making them available for use in the user interface. It uses CSS masks and SVG images to create the icons. The plugin defines CSS variables for each icon, which can be used to apply the icons to elements. It also provides a helper function to easily create icon elements.
